title: (x) Pet Shop Boys single type - Univers {Patricia}
content:
Hi,

Although I am certain this is a typeface I should be able to identify myself - I am stuck. I would really apreciate it if any of you could take a look and see if you recognize it.

Thanks in advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [PSB.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20101217235955/http:/typophile.com/files/PSB.jpg) | 60.67 KB |
author: Corey Holms

comments.content:
I think you are right.

Doh! I knew it would be something embarrassingly simple like this. Thanks.  
Univers is one of those amazing typefaces that whenever someone else sets it, it looks superb - whenever I use it, it looks clunky and terrible.

Thanks a lot pattyfab! I appreciate it.
